nodes.text: These robes once belonged to Aleema Keto, cousin of Satal and co-leader of the dark side cult of the Krath. A master of Sith magic, she seduced Ulic Qel-Droma, who later killed Satal and took command of the Krath along with Aleema. These garments bestowed increased strength and wisdom upon the wearer, as well as allowing them some small aid in reconnecting with the Force.
It was possible that the Jedi Exile acquired these robes during her travels in 3951 BBY, in the midst of the First Jedi Purge.
Only a character whose alignment is dark-sided can equip the item. Additionally, the entry for the item within The Sith Lords incorrectly states that Aleema was once a Jedi.
